SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, here we are again—back in the
Lost Realms. I always figured the next
time I'd come through here was when
I was heading home to Pulchra.

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: LoLo
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text: You know what you need to do, yes?

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Sure do! I gotta use Macha's power
to figure out where to go.

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
There's the door! With magic like this,
there's no way we can get lost here.

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
It looks to be a little far away,
but that's nothing another little
spritz of magic can't fix!

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_2nd_WAVE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_2nd_WAVE_000_CUT_000_0.text: Wait, why are there two lines!? Did two cats get away or something? Oh man, which should I do first?

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_3rd_WAVE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_3rd_WAVE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Okay, wait. There are STILL two lines!?
But I thought I brought a cat home!
Oh man, do I have to choose AGAIN!?

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_4th_WAVE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_4th_WAVE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
These dumb cats are going
to rule my life forever...

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_100_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_100_CUT_0.text: Okay, FOUR lines!? So does this mean all four cats escaped to different worlds!? Ugh! This is all HIS fault—he ruined my life!

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_2nd_WAVE_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_2nd_WAVE_100_CUT_000_0.text:
We've got three left,
and I'm gonna find 'em all.

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_3rd_WAVE_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_3rd_WAVE_100_CUT_000_0.text:
All right, just two left!
I see the finish line now.

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_4th_WAVE_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_4th_WAVE_100_CUT_000_0.text: Last one! Wait for me, kitty!

SUB_C01_GMCK_AMYA_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_GMCK_AMYA_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.text:
Hmmm... Is this some kind of arcane creature?
I mean, I feel like I knew someone who had
a familiar that looked like this, but maybe not.

SUB_C01_GMCK_AMYA_TRADEDRUM_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_GMCK_AMYA_TRADEDRUM_000_CUT_000_.text: Why is there a machine here?

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_00.text: At last, I have regained my true form!

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Wow, you really ARE the Dismal King!
Honestly, you were way cuter before.
You should've stayed a kid.

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Though my body has been regained, my power
remains absent. Now guard me well, for I am
still quite some way from returning to my true
and complete self.

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Okay, but do you know how quickly I would've
agreed if you asked me all that while you
were still a kid?

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh boy. Oooh boy. Is this what
it's like outside of the Kosmos? Please, Canker! Pinch my cellular wall
and wake me from this horrid nightmare!
I don't want to be alone here!

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
We meet again, Erytheia!
Did you take care of Canker?

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Foreign body detected! Oh, thank goodness!
Well, I have no use for Canker anymore.
Aaaaaand away you go!

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Now let us sally forth together!
You and I will need to get used to
being in the same boat, as it were.

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, dang. I got kicked out of Pulchra
and I have nowhere to go. What am
I gonna dooo!?

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Cheer up, Ameya. No matter where you go,
you will always be a witch of Pulchra.

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_020.text:
LoLo! You followed me!
But wait, now YOU can't
go back to Pulchra either!

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Of course I followed you.
I'm your familiar.

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_040.text: Oh, LoLo... I love you so much.

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Hear me, Lady Ameya. I, Shinobu Kato,
hereby swear to serve you loyally
for all of your days. If there is anything I can do for you,
simply name it and I shall see it done.

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: LoLo
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Hmm? You're a squire.
What are you doing here?

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_070.text:
In Pulchra, I am known only as
Squire #15413837—but beyond the
borders of the Witchdom, I can take
the name of Shinobu Kato! Having grown fond of my new name,
I have no intention of returning
to that wretched place.

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Macha_Copy
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_080.text: And you have a copy of Macha, too!

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Aw, thanks so much, you guys. It's really
encouraging to know I'm not alone.

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_100.text:
And hey, I bet I can still use Macha's magic
so long as I have her copy. Think it can show
me where I'm supposed to go next?

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: LoLo
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I wouldn't depend on it too much.
If anything, it's all Macha's fault
things turned out as they have.

SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Well, I still have things to do
outside Pulchra, so let's get to it!

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_FINAL_WAVE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_FINAL_WAVE_000_CUT_000.text:
Okay, there's the door. I hope
whatever's waiting for me on
the other side isn't too painful.

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_FINAL_WAVE_000_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_FINAL_WAVE_000_CUT_000.text:
You've experienced a great many things
across a great many worlds, Ameya.
Don't you think you've already had
more than enough fun?

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_FINAL_WAVE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_FINAL_WAVE_000_CUT_000.text:
I mean, I guess so... But if I could pick
between this last thing being fun or
painful, why wouldn't I pick fun?

SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_FINAL_WAVE_000_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_C01_SCAN_AMYA_FINAL_WAVE_000_CUT_000.text:
I suppose you have a point there.
I just pray this mysterious character
isn't taking you somewhere unsavory.

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
So you come at last, Ameya Aisling of the Witchdom Pulchra—
and unlike last time, you are armed with powerful magic. Good!
Very good, in fact! For this time, I will claim your magic, analyze it,
and use those findings to claim all the magic in Pulchra for my own!

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Blast! The goddess has led us
straight into a trap!

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
No she didn't, LoLo. She did us a favor.
She led us to this guy so we could get
our revenge on him!

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Do you know how much hardship I had to go
through to get good marks on my Witchterms
because of you? Do you know how much I had
to sacrifice in order to protect Pulchra!?

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
I might not be able to return to Pulchra,
but everyone who I've ever loved still
lives there, and there's no way I'm
going to let you hurt them!

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
Ha! Take that, sucker!
You're PATHETIC!

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Man_Overworld
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
Heh heh heh... Nicely done. Sadly for you,
there would be no point in my drawing all
the magic of the Conjoined Worlds to one
place if things did not unfold this way.
So enough play—the true battle begins now!

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
The magic scattered across the worlds.
It's going back where it belongs.

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Macha
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
Thank you, Ameya. I did not think you would
ever go so far for my sake—or that you
would pay such a heavy price to do so.

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
Pulchra needs a Watcher in order to
regenerate, and I was happy to serve.

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Macha
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
Keep using the magic of the Emerald Beyond
that I have granted you, Ameya—and know I
will be praying that the Emerald Wave
links you back to your home one day.

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: LoLo
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
What are you going
to do now, Ameya?

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
Probably step through that door.
I mean, there must be somebody over
there who needs magic, right?

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: LoLo
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text: Are you going to be okay?

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
Of course! 'Cause no matter where
I go, I'll always be Ameya Aisling,
witch of Pulchra!

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.text:
So you come at last, Ameya Aisling of the Witchdom Pulchra—
and unlike last time, you are armed with powerful magic. Good!
Very good, in fact! For this time, I will take the magic from your
pathetic self and erase you from existence before removing all
magic from the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.text:
Do you know how much hardship I had to go through
to get good marks on my Witchterms because of you?
Do you know how much I had to sacrifice to scrape
together this much magic!?

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.text:
I might not be able to return to Pulchra,
but everyone who I've ever loved still
lives there, and there's no way I'll let
you take away the power it gave me!

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_010.speaker: Man_Overworld
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_010.text:
Heh... Nicely done. You are my greatest
enemy—the selfsame one I must defeat.
Which is why I will now use all of
my power to render you unto dust!

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.text:
I can't imagine a world without magic,
so I'm going to do everything I can
to protect it from now on.

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.speaker: Macha
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.text:
I watched you leave Pulchra and take a step
on the path to protecting magic across the
Conjoined Worlds, Ameya. I cannot thank you
enough for making my dreams come true.

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.text:
Oh, I didn't do this for some kind of noble purpose.
I just couldn't stand the thought of all magic being
erased. Honestly, I just wanted to enjoy a fun little
life of witching in Pulchra.

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.speaker: Macha
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.text:
Then continue using the magic of the Emerald
Beyond I have granted you, for the Emerald Wave
will ever lead you to those who seek your aid
and places where there is magic.

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.text:
I'm going through that door,
because I know there's
something waiting for me.

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.speaker: LoLo
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.text:
Does this excite you,
Ameya Aisling?

SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CUT_020.text:
You bet it does! I've got worlds I've
never seen and friends I've yet to
meet, and it's all waiting for me
on the other side of that door!

SUB_C01_GMCK_AMYA_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_C01_GMCK_AMYA_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.text:
You again? What'll you
do for me this time?
